metadata.title: CVE-2017-0664 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: A elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Android framework. Product: Android. Versions: 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID: A-36491278.

notes.note: sbeattie> code not built in android-platform-frameworks-base

criterions.comment: android-framework-23 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
